Text: Re Ercot Losses Cc downloaded the new loss matrix I have placed the spreadsheet in the M hour ERCOTnew folder called Fall ERCOT Thanks From Keller Mayeaux ECT AM To Jay NRON Cyril CT John CT Rudy CT Richard ct Wayne NRON Juan NRON Greg NRON Miguel NRON Russell nron Joe nron Joe nron Doug nron Larry F nron Keller nron Chad nron Dean CT Don CT Lawrence nron cc Subject Ercot Losses Use the new loss matrices located in Ercot Iso home pageI or someone will have to go back and look at the losses from Sept till Sept becouse I think we were using summers lossesFALL IS SIGNIFICANTLY LOWER EFFECTIVE SEPT

Re Plant deal CT PM To Rudy CT Don CT Kayne CT Richard ct Lawrence nron Lawrence nron Juan NRON Larry NRON Jeff nron John CT Dean CT Keller nron Doug nron Cyril CT Chad nron Joe nron Greg NRON Jay NRON Thresa A CT cc Subject Plant deal tickets All of the plant operations should be included on one of the deals listed below Just add a new leg to the correct deal number Plant generation should not be in the Hourly book If the hourly desk has taken a position a Control Area ticket need to be created If you have any questions please give me a call X or steno Thanks Laurel

IPGwasnt sure if we needed to send out the report since it was a half holiday for most companies so i opted not to I didnt send one Monday since it was a nerc holiday Hopefully she wont call and give you shit about it Plus we didnt have prices in so your guess is much better than mine as to what actually happened Thanks Chad
